abstract: Nokia is buying Navteq, the maker of digital mapping and navigational software, for $8.1 billion, as it seeks to migrate location services onto its range of phones.
snippet: Nokia is buying Navteq, the maker of digital mapping and navigational software, for $8.1 billion, as it seeks to migrate location services onto its range of phones.
lead_paragraph: Nokia’s plans to acquire the map and navigational software maker Navteq for $8.1 billion raise the stakes in the competition among wireless carriers, handset makers and new entrants like Google and Microsoft to deliver information and advertising directly to cellphone users.

headline.main: Nokia Does a Map Deal, Signaling Strategic Bet
headline.print_headline: Nokia Does Map Deal, Signaling Strategic Bet

abstract: Ignition Partners, the venture capital firm founded by former Microsoft and McCaw Cellular executives, has raised $675 million that it will use to bankroll as many as 40 new private companies.
lead_paragraph: Ignition Partners, the venture capital firm founded by former Microsoft and McCaw Cellular executives, has raised $675 million that it will use to bankroll as many as 40 new private companies.

abstract: Microsoft is lending a helping hand to British companies with “high potential” with a new program to support start-ups.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft is lending a helping hand to British companies with “high potential” with a new program to support start-ups.

headline.main: Microsoft Launches Support Program for British Start-Ups

abstract: As industry observers wait for the next move in reported deal talks between Facebook and Microsoft, another, albeit considerably smaller, deal related to social networking site has been signed.
lead_paragraph: As industry observers wait for the next move in reported deal talks between Facebook and Microsoft, another, albeit considerably smaller, deal related to social networking site has been signed.

headline.main: Harvard Grads Ink Deal for ‘Facebook Book’
